Uses of Package
br.octahedron.cotopaxi.cloudservice

Packages that use br.octahedron.cotopaxi.cloudservice
br.octahedron.cotopaxi.cloudservice This package contains high-level, and platform independent, abstractions for CloudServices. 
br.octahedron.cotopaxi.cloudservice.common Contains the CloudServices implementations that are platform independent. 
br.octahedron.cotopaxi.config

Classes in br.octahedron.cotopaxi.cloudservice used by br.octahedron.cotopaxi.cloudservice

          Indicates that an exception occurs at the datastore.
DatastoreFacade
          Defines all Datastore Operations.
DisabledMemcacheException
          Indicates that the Memcache is disabled.
DistributedCounter
          A simple distributed counter that simulates multiple counters storing each counter with a key.
DistributedLock
          A distributed reentrant lock (semaphore) over memcache.
EmailFacade
          Facade for Mail Service.
MemcacheFacade
          Facade for Cache service.
TaskManagerFacade
          Class responsible by execute tasks.
URLFetchFacade
          Facade for URL fetch service.
